setupParameters.name: oauth
setupParameters.description: Sign in with your Google account to grant access to Gmail, Drive, Calendar, and Sheets.

setupParameters.name: oauth
setupParameters.description: Sign in with your Microsoft account to grant access to Outlook, OneDrive, Calendar, and Teams.

setupParameters.name: apiKey
setupParameters.description: Your Firecrawl API key. Get one at firecrawl.dev.

setupParameters.name: oauth
setupParameters.description: Sign in with your X (Twitter) account to authorize posting.

setupParameters.name: oauth
setupParameters.description: Sign in with Facebook to authorize posting to your Pages.

setupParameters.name: oauth
setupParameters.description: Sign in with Facebook/Instagram to authorize publishing to your Instagram Business account.

setupParameters.name: oauth
setupParameters.description: Sign in with LinkedIn to authorize posting to your profile.

setupParameters.name: oauth
setupParameters.description: Sign in with Reddit to authorize submitting posts.

setupParameters.name: oauth
setupParameters.description: Sign in with TikTok to authorize publishing videos and photos.

setupParameters.name: oauth
setupParameters.description: Sign in with Slack to authorize sending messages and files to channels.

setupParameters.name: oauth
setupParameters.description: Sign in with Microsoft Teams to authorize sending chat messages.

setupParameters.name: botToken
setupParameters.description: Your Telegram Bot token from BotFather.

setupParameters.name: fromPhone
setupParameters.description: Default Twilio phone number for SMS and voice (E.164 format).

setupParameters.name: sendGridApiKey
setupParameters.description: SendGrid API key for sending email via Twilio.

setupParameters.name: oauth
setupParameters.description: Sign in with Facebook to authorize WhatsApp Business messaging.

setupParameters.name: oauth
setupParameters.description: Sign in with X (Twitter) to authorize sending direct messages.

tools.name: Gmail Search
tools.description: Search Gmail messages using Gmail query syntax. Returns matching messages with subject, sender, date, and preview.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to search Gmail messages when the user wants to find specific emails. Supports full Gmail query syntax (e.g., from:user@example.com, subject:meeting, has:attachment).

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Gmail search query using Gmail query syntax (e.g., 'from:boss@company.com subject:budget')

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-50, default: 10)

tools.name: Gmail Unread
tools.description: List unread messages in the Gmail inbox. Returns unread messages with subject, sender, date, and preview.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to check for new unread emails in the user's Gmail inbox.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-50, default: 10)

tools.name: Gmail Read
tools.description: Read a full email message by its message ID. Returns subject, from, to, date, and body content.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to read the full content of a specific Gmail message. Requires a message ID obtained from Gmail Search or Gmail Unread.

parameters.name: messageId
parameters.description: The Gmail message ID to read

tools.name: Gmail Send
tools.description: Send an email via Gmail. Supports to, cc, bcc recipients with subject and body text.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to send an email from the user's Gmail account. Always confirm the recipient and content with the user before sending.

tools.name: Google Drive Search
tools.description: Search Google Drive for files matching a query. Returns file id, name, type, and last modified time.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to find files in the user's Google Drive by name. The query matches against file names.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search text to match against file names

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-100, default: 10)

tools.name: Google Drive Read
tools.description: Read a file's content from Google Drive by file ID. Google Docs/Sheets/Slides are exported as plain text. Binary files are returned as base64.
tools.shortDescription: Read a file from Google Drive
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to read the content of a Google Drive file. Requires a file ID obtained from Google Drive Search.

tools.name: Google Calendar List
tools.description: List events from Google Calendar with optional time range filtering. Returns event summary, start/end times, description, and location.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to list upcoming calendar events or events within a specific time range from the user's Google Calendar.

parameters.name: timeMin
parameters.description: Start of time range in ISO 8601 format (default: now)

parameters.name: timeMax
parameters.description: End of time range in ISO 8601 format

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-100, default: 10)

tools.name: Google Calendar Create
tools.description: Create a new event on Google Calendar with summary, start/end times, optional description and attendees.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to create a new calendar event. Requires at minimum a summary and start/end times in ISO 8601 format. Confirm details with the user before creating.

tools.name: Google Sheets Read
tools.description: Read data from a Google Sheets spreadsheet by ID and range. Returns values as a JSON array of rows.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to read data from a Google Sheets spreadsheet. Requires the spreadsheet ID and a range in A1 notation (e.g., 'Sheet1!A1:D10').

tools.name: Google Sheets Write
tools.description: Write data to a Google Sheets spreadsheet at a specified range. Accepts values as a JSON 2D array.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to write data to a Google Sheets spreadsheet. Provide values as a JSON 2D array (e.g., [["Name","Age"],["Alice","30"]]). Formulas are parsed automatically.

tools.name: Outlook Mail Search
tools.description: Search Outlook mail using Microsoft Graph. Returns matching messages with subject, sender, date, and preview.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to search the user's Outlook mailbox for specific messages.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-50, default: 10)

tools.name: Outlook Mail Unread
tools.description: Get unread emails from the Outlook inbox. Returns messages with subject, sender, date, and preview.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to check for new unread emails in the user's Outlook inbox.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-50, default: 10)

tools.name: Outlook Mail Read
tools.description: Read a full email by message ID. Returns subject, sender, recipients, date, and body content. Prefers plain text format.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to read the full content of a specific Outlook email. Requires a message ID from Mail Search or Mail Unread.

parameters.name: messageId
parameters.description: The Outlook message ID to read

tools.name: Outlook Mail Send
tools.description: Send an email via Outlook using Microsoft Graph. Supports to, cc, bcc recipients.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to send an email from the user's Outlook account. Always confirm the recipient and content with the user before sending.

tools.name: OneDrive Search
tools.description: Search files in the user's OneDrive. Returns file id, name, web URL, size, and last modified date.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to find files in the user's OneDrive storage.

tools.name: OneDrive Read
tools.description: Download and read a file from OneDrive by item ID. Returns content as text for text-based files, or indicates binary type for others.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to read the content of a OneDrive file. Requires an item ID from OneDrive Search. Text files up to 5 MB are returned as content; binary files return metadata only.

parameters.name: itemId
parameters.description: The OneDrive item ID of the file

tools.name: Outlook Calendar List
tools.description: List calendar events from the user's primary Outlook calendar. Supports time range filtering. Returns subject, start/end, location, and organizer.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to list calendar events from the user's Outlook calendar, optionally filtered by time range.

parameters.name: timeMin
parameters.description: Filter events starting from this datetime (ISO 8601 format)

parameters.name: timeMax
parameters.description: Filter events ending before this datetime (ISO 8601 format)

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-50, default: 10)

tools.name: Outlook Calendar Create
tools.description: Create a calendar event in the user's primary Outlook calendar with subject, start/end times, optional body, attendees, time zone, and location.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to create a new calendar event in the user's Outlook calendar. Confirm details with the user before creating.

tools.name: Teams Channel Send
tools.description: Send a message to a Microsoft Teams channel using Microsoft Graph. Supports text and HTML content.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to send a message to a Microsoft Teams channel. Requires the team ID and channel ID.

tools.name: Web Scrape
tools.description: Scrape a single web page and return its content as markdown. Powered by Firecrawl.
tools.shortDescription: Scrape a web page to markdown
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to scrape a single web page and get its content as clean markdown. Ideal for reading articles, documentation, or any web page content.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The web page URL to scrape

parameters.name: formats
parameters.description: Output formats as a JSON array (e.g., ["markdown", "html"]). Default: ["markdown"]

tools.name: Web Crawl
tools.description: Crawl multiple pages from a website domain. Returns an async job that crawls pages following links. Powered by Firecrawl.
tools.shortDescription: Crawl multiple pages from a site
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to crawl an entire website or section of a website. Starts from a root URL and follows links. Use includes/excludes to limit scope.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The root URL to start crawling from

parameters.name: maxPages
parameters.description: Maximum number of pages to crawl

tools.name: Web Search
tools.description: Search the web and extract content from results. Returns search results with extracted page content. Powered by Firecrawl.
tools.shortDescription: Search the web with content extraction
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to search the web and get content-extracted results. More thorough than a basic web search because it extracts and returns page content.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of search results to return

tools.name: Web Extract
tools.description: AI-powered structured data extraction from a web page. Extracts specific data based on a prompt and optional JSON schema. Powered by Firecrawl.
tools.shortDescription: Extract structured data from a page
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to extract specific structured data from a web page using AI. Provide a prompt describing what data to extract. Optionally provide a JSON schema for the expected output structure.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The web page URL to extract data from

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description: AI prompt describing what data to extract

parameters.name: schema
parameters.description: Optional JSON schema defining the expected output structure

tools.name: Web Map
tools.description: Discover all URLs on a website by mapping its link structure. Returns a list of discovered URLs. Powered by Firecrawl.
tools.shortDescription: Map all URLs on a website
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to discover all URLs on a website. Useful for understanding site structure before crawling or scraping specific pages.

tools.name: X Post
tools.description: Post a tweet to X (Twitter) with optional media, reply, or quote tweet. Supports image and video attachments.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to post a tweet to X (Twitter). Always confirm the content with the user before posting. Supports media attachments via URL or base64.

parameters.name: mediaUrl
parameters.description: URL of media file (image/video) to attach

tools.name: Facebook Post
tools.description: Post to a Facebook Page. Supports text posts, photo posts, and link shares. Pages only — cannot post to personal profiles.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to post to a Facebook Page. Requires a Page ID. Supports text, photo (via URL), and link posts. Always confirm with the user before posting.

parameters.name: pageId
parameters.description: The Facebook Page ID to post to

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Text content of the post (or caption for photos)

parameters.name: mediaUrl
parameters.description: URL of an image to post as a photo

parameters.name: link
parameters.description: URL to share as a link post

tools.name: Instagram Publish
tools.description: Publish content to Instagram. Supports single image, video (Reel), and carousel posts. Media must be at publicly accessible URLs. Requires a Business or Creator account.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to publish content to Instagram. Requires at least one media source (imageUrl, videoUrl, or carouselUrls). Media must be at publicly accessible URLs. Always confirm with the user before publishing.

parameters.name: imageUrl
parameters.description: URL of a single image to publish

parameters.name: videoUrl
parameters.description: URL of a video to publish as a Reel

parameters.name: carouselUrls
parameters.description: JSON array of URLs for a carousel post (e.g., ["url1", "url2"])

tools.name: LinkedIn Post
tools.description: Post to LinkedIn. Supports text posts and image posts. Images can be provided via URL or base64 encoding.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to post to the user's LinkedIn profile. Always confirm the content with the user before posting.

parameters.name: mediaUrl
parameters.description: URL of image to upload and attach

tools.name: Reddit Submit
tools.description: Submit a post to a subreddit. Supports text (self) posts and link posts with optional flair.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to submit a post to a subreddit. Requires the subreddit name (without 'r/') and a title. Always confirm with the user before submitting.

parameters.name: flairId
parameters.description: Post flair ID (if the subreddit uses flairs)

tools.name: TikTok Publish
tools.description: Publish a video or photo post to TikTok. Uses TikTok's Content Posting API. Note: Unaudited apps post as private/self-only visibility.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to publish content to TikTok. Requires at least one media source (videoUrl, videoBase64, or photoUrls). Always confirm with the user before publishing.

parameters.name: videoUrl
parameters.description: URL of video file to publish

parameters.name: photoUrls
parameters.description: JSON array of photo URLs for a photo post (e.g., ["url1", "url2"])

tools.name: Slack Send
tools.description: Send a message to a Slack channel. Supports threaded replies and file attachments via URL or base64.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to send a message to a Slack channel. Requires the channel ID or name. Supports threaded replies via threadTs and file attachments.

parameters.name: threadTs
parameters.description: Parent message timestamp for threaded replies

tools.name: Teams Chat Send
tools.description: Send a message to a Microsoft Teams chat using the Graph API. Supports text and HTML content.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to send a message to a Microsoft Teams chat. Requires the chat ID. This is separate from the M365 Teams Channel Send tool — this sends to individual/group chats.

tools.name: Telegram Send
tools.description: Send a message to a Telegram chat. Supports text messages and media (photos, videos, documents) via URL or base64.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to send a message via a Telegram bot. Requires the chat ID. Supports text, photos, videos, and document attachments.

parameters.name: mediaUrl
parameters.description: URL of media file to send (photo, video, or document)

tools.name: Twilio SMS
tools.description: Send an SMS message via Twilio. Supports MMS with media attachments.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to send an SMS/MMS message via Twilio. Requires the recipient phone number in E.164 format (e.g., +1234567890).

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Recipient phone number in E.164 format

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Sender phone number (defaults to configured number)

tools.name: Twilio Voice
tools.description: Initiate a voice call via Twilio. Uses a TwiML URL to define the call flow.
tools.shortDescription: Make a phone call via Twilio
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to initiate a phone call via Twilio. Requires a TwiML URL that defines what happens during the call.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Recipient phone number in E.164 format

parameters.name: twimlUrl
parameters.description: URL to TwiML script defining the call flow

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Caller phone number (defaults to configured number)

tools.name: Twilio Email
tools.description: Send an email via Twilio SendGrid. Supports plain text and HTML content.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to send an email via Twilio SendGrid. Always confirm the recipient and content with the user before sending.

parameters.name: isHtml
parameters.description: Set to 'true' for HTML content, 'false' for plain text (default: false)

tools.name: WhatsApp Send
tools.description: Send a WhatsApp message via the WhatsApp Business API. Supports text, template, and media messages.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to send a WhatsApp message via the Business API. Requires a WhatsApp Business Phone Number ID and the recipient's phone number. Supports text, templates, and media.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Recipient phone number in E.164 format

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Message text (required unless using template or media)

parameters.name: templateName
parameters.description: Name of a pre-approved WhatsApp message template

parameters.name: templateParams
parameters.description: JSON array of template parameter values

parameters.name: mediaUrl
parameters.description: URL of media file for media messages

tools.name: X Direct Message
tools.description: Send a direct message on X (Twitter). Supports text messages with optional media attachments.
tools.useInstructions: Use this tool to send a direct message on X (Twitter). Requires the recipient's X user ID.

parameters.name: recipientId
parameters.description: X user ID of the recipient

parameters.name: mediaUrl
parameters.description: URL of media file to attach

plugins.name: Google Workspace
plugins.description: Complete Google Workspace integration with Gmail, Drive, Calendar, and Sheets. Search, read, and send emails. Search and read Drive files. List and create calendar events. Read and write spreadsheet data.
plugins.shortDescription: Gmail, Drive, Calendar, and Sheets integration

plugins.name: Microsoft 365
plugins.description: Complete Microsoft 365 integration with Outlook, OneDrive, Calendar, and Teams. Search, read, and send emails. Search and read OneDrive files. List and create calendar events. Send Teams channel messages.
plugins.shortDescription: Outlook, OneDrive, Calendar, and Teams integration

plugins.name: Firecrawl Web Tools
plugins.description: Web scraping, crawling, search, extraction, and URL mapping powered by Firecrawl. Scrape pages to markdown, crawl entire sites, search the web with content extraction, extract structured data with AI, and map website URLs.
